data.title: Noomi Rapace Celebrity News and Gossip
data.text:
Salma Hayek holds hands with husband Francois-Henri Pinault while arriving at the Kering Women In Motion Awards during the 2021 Cannes Film Festival on Sunday (July 11) in Cannes, France.

The longtime married couple were joined by festival juror Maggie Gyllenhaal, as well as actors Noomi Rapace and Melissa George at the event.

If you don’t know, the Women In Motion awards are given to prominent women and young female talents who seek to raise the profile of women in the industry – through the choices they have made, their careers and their view of the world.

Earlier in the evening, Melissa stepped out for the premiere of Bergman Island.

FYI: Salma wore a stunning blue Gucci dress and Boucheron jewelry. Melissa wore a beautiful Christian Dior gown and a Moynat bag.

See over 35+ pictures inside of Salma Hayek, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Melissa George and Noomi Rapace…

Bella Hadid shows off a new hairstyle courtesy of a wig while attending the Dior Men fashion show on Friday (January 17) in Paris, France.

The 23-year-old model had a busy day as she walked in the Berluti fashion show earlier in the day.

A star-studded crowd was in attendance at the fashion show. Some of the stars there included the Beckham family, Robert Pattinson, Cara Delevingne, and Kate Moss.

Celebs pictured in this post include actors Christina Ricci, Noomi Rapace, Luka Sabbat, and Douglas Booth, models like Adwoa Aboah, Younes Bendjima, Jordan Barrett, and Kailand Morris, skateboarder Evan Mock, and music stars Diplo, Tyga, J Balvin, Courtney Love, Ryan Beatty, and Robyn.

40+ pictures inside from the Dior fashion show… More Here! »

Caitriona Balfe, Tracee Ellis Ross, and Naomi Watts walk the red carpet at the 2019 Fashion Awards on Monday (December 2) at Royal Albert Hall in London, England.

So many stars stepped out for the annual event, which is the biggest night in British fashion every year.

More stars in attendance included Sandra Oh, Noomi Rapace, Alicia Silverstone, Hayley Atwell, Poppy Delevingne, and Sabrina Elba.

FYI: Caitriona is wearing Armani Prive. Tracee is wearing Loewe. Naomi is wearing Burberry. Hayley is wearing kate spade new york. Noomi is wearing Ann Demeulemeester. Sandra is wearing an Erdem dress, Gina shoes, Annoushka rings, and Yoko London pearls. Poppy is wearing an Oscar de la Renta dress, a Jimmy Choo bag and shoes, and a Messika necklace.

Noomi Rapace and Jimmy Fallon had themselves a full-blown wig party on last night’s (November 6) episode of The Tonight Show!

The 39-year-old actress and host Jimmy, 45, tried to have a professional discussion about her role in Amazon Prime series Jack Ryan, but unfortunately, their fun wigs were civil to the point of distraction.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Noomi Rapace

“Uhm, so yeah, ‘Jack Ryan’, yeah, so, uh, basically,” Noomi tried to explain before letting out a sigh, which summed up the entire interview.

“You see how much fun it is,” Rapace exclaimed while pointing to her 10-foot-tall afro. “I didn’t even say anything and he started laughing.”

READ MORE: John Krasinski Joins New ‘Jack Ryan’ Co-Stars Noomi Rapace & Michael Kelly at NYC

Click inside to watch the rest of Noomi Rapace’s appearance on The Tonight Show…More Here! »

John Krasinski is all smiles on the black carpet at the season two premiere of Tom Clancy’s Jack Ryan on Tuesday night (October 29) at Metrograph in New York City.

The 40-year-old actor looked handsome in a dark purple suit with a navy dress shirt and white sneakers as he promoted season two of his Amazon Prime Video series.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of John Krasinski

Joining John at the premiere were his co-stars Noomi Rapace, Cristina Umana, and Michael Kelly.

Jack Ryan will be released on Amazon Prime Video on Friday, November 1 – check out the new trailer here!

READ MORE: John Krasinski Raised $500,000 for Charity by ‘Attacking’ His Celeb Friends!

FYI: John is wearing Paul Smith.

10+ pictures inside of John Krasinski and his co-stars at the premiere…More Here! »

John Krasinski is ready for the new season of Jack Ryan!

The 39-year-old actor stepped out for the show’s panel during 2019 New York Comic-Con on Saturday afternoon (October 5) at Jacob K. Javits Convention Center in New York City.

He was joined by his new co-stars Noomi Rapace and Michael Kelly, who both recently said John was the major reason they joined the show.

“I had met John when I did a film with [his wife] Emily [Blunt] years back. At the kick-off party, I played darts with him, with both of them. I really love those guys. They called about this job and sent me the pilot and I was like, ‘Oh my god, yeah, totally. I’m totally in,’” Michael told EW.

Noomi added, “I watched A Quiet Place, maybe a few months before I got the call. It was like, ‘John is in London, he wants to meet you for Jack Ryan season 2,’ and I was like, ‘Okay!’ It was like we just connected straight away…I’d do anything with him.”

Make sure to watch the trailer for the new season!
